posts.text:
Hi !
I am selling a one year old Asus A53S laptop
Features
Processor: Intel core i7-2670QM 2.2ghz
RAM: 4 GB
Battery life: 4 hrs
Graphic card: Nvidia GEFORCE GT540M 2GB
Hard drive: 500 GB
Windows 7 64 bits
Screen: 15.6 "
Price: 70.000 ISK
Please contact by mail to: 
ale.l.arcos@gmail.com
 or by phone: 823-3661
You are welcome to check the computer!
Regards,
Ale
